title: Wellness Classes, Seminars and Screenings - San Diego - Sharp HealthCare
description: Sharp HealthCare offers Wellness classes, educational seminars, screenings and support groups in San Diego.
cleaned_text: Classes and Events Wellness classes and seminars in San Diego Wellness Be Well for Life Program Ten-week wellness education program to help guide you towards healthy, lasting lifestyle changes. Healthy Hearts Webinar This free online class teaches practical tips for healthy cooking, shopping and dining out to reduce risk of heart disease. Second Breath Tobacco Cessation Webinar This online class guides you through the process of becoming tobacco-free. Weight-Loss Program Orientation Webinar If you're looking to make your weight-loss goals a reality, attend
